ASSISTANT.DEBUT_DESCRIPTION:
The wizard will allow you to enter your basic information (profile, bank accounts, credit cards, income, expenses) to start your budget.
You should have on hand your data (amount, date, frequency, balance) to facilitate the entry in the different phases of the wizard.
If you do not want to use the wizard at this time, click on the "Cancel" button, otherwise click on "Next".
ASSISTANT.FIN_DESCRIPTION:
Congratulations, you have completed your new budget.

You can review or continue your budget using the « Back » button, otherwise finalize your budget using the « Finish ».

Drop ofx, qfx or.csv HERE
or
click to upload
CONCILIATION.TEXT_FIN_IMPORTATION: Click on finish to go back to the main menu and end the reconciliation.
CONCILIATION.FIN_DESCRIPTION:
Congratulations, you have completed your reconciliation.

You can review or continue your reconciliation by using the « Back » button or return to the menu.
CONCILIATION.AIDE:
To reconcile your data from your bank account or credit card company, download your file from their web site. The files type accepted by Budget Express are QFX (Quicken), OFX (Ms Money), and CSV (Comma Separated Value (Excel)).

The transactions from the file will be posted in the left window. Your planned operation from Budget Express will be posted in the right windows. The period displayed, by default, is the current month, you will be able to change that period using the drop-down menu.

Click on a transaction from your file in the left windows and link it to a planned operation on the right by clicking on the « reconcile » button of the operation. This will add a « current » transaction to that operation. By default, the indicator “this operation took place” will change to “yes”. You will be able to change the indicator in the calendar if needed.

If the planned operation does not exist, you can create a new one by clicking on the red cross button on the right panel.

To create a “current” only transaction (not associated to an existing operation), click on the red cross button in the left panel.

Click on “Next” to go terminate the reconciliation. Click on the “Finish” button to go to the calendar or on the “back” button to go back to the current reconciliation.
CONCILIATION.AIDELIEN:
To reconcile your data from your bank account or credit card company, use your bank link.

The transactions will be posted in the left window. Your planned operation from Budget Express will be posted in the right windows. The period displayed, by default, is the current month, you will be able to change that period using the drop-down menu.

Click on a transaction in the left windows and link it to a planned operation on the right by clicking on the « reconcile » button of the operation. This will add a « current » transaction to that operation. By default, the indicator “this operation took place” will change to “yes”. You will be able to change the indicator in the calendar if needed.

If the planned operation does not exist, you can create a new one by clicking on the red cross button on the right panel.

To create a “current” only transaction (not associated to an existing operation), click on the red cross button in the left panel.

Click on “Next” to go terminate the reconciliation. Click on the “Finish” button to go to the calendar or on the “back” button to go back to the current reconciliation.

ANALYSE.TEXT_AIDE_DETAILLE:
Detailed Report by Operation


This report presents all operations detailed by date. Expenses and income are presented together but all other operation type is presented by sections. By default (the presentation is by entries and output. If you use comparatively, the presentation will be by amount planned and real.

Comparative no : The analysis presents the entry and output for each operation

Comparative yes : The analysis presents the planned budget and the real (reconciled) operation.

Operation type : By default, Budget Express will analyze all operation types. If you wish not to analyze a particular operation type, change the indicator to No.

Conciliation : If you print the report with comparative yes, you can print out the description from your operation reconciliation entries.

All accounts : By default all bank and credit card account will be used to analyze your data. You can choose a particular account. In that case only the operations related to that particular account will be analyzed.

Category : By default, the report will present only the sub-categories. If you wish to group the operations by categories, use this indicator.

Print : Click on the printer icon in the top right corner to print or save in PDF format, your analysis.
ANALYSE.TEXT_AIDE_SOMMAIRE:
Summary Report by Operation


This report presents the subtotal by subcategories for the period chosen. Each operation type is presented by sections.

Comparative no : The analysis presents the entry and output for each operation.

Comparative yes : The analysis presents the planned budget and the real (reconciled) operation.

Operation type : By default, Budget Express will analyze all operation types. If you wish not to analyze a particular operation type, change the indicator to No.

Graphic : Use this indicator if you wish to present a graphic of the major revenues and expenses subcategories at the end of the analysis.

All accounts : By default all bank and credit card account will be used to analyze your data. You can choose a particular account. In that case only the operations related to that particular account will be analyzed.

Category : By default the report will present only the sub-categories. If you wish to group the operations by categories, use this indicator.

Print : Click on the printer icon in the top right corner to print or save in PDF format, your analysis.
ANALYSE.TEXT_AIDE_BILAN:
Financial Report


This report presents your financial statement by assets and liabilities. The total from your bank account, credit card, savings and loan are presented to calculate your net worth.

Print : Click on the printer icon in the top right corner to print or save in PDF format, your analysis.
ANALYSE.TEXT_AIDE_FLUX:
Cash Flow


The cash flow report is a presentation, in a chart, of your bank account cash flow for the period.
